short_description: american roller s.a de c.v. is a heavy construction equipment supplier based in cuautitlán izcalli, mexico.
long_description: líder del mercado en méxico como fabricante de rodillos para transportadores de banda tales como: rodillos, poleas, camas de impacto, cubiertas para transportador, entre otros. formamos parte del selecto y pequeño grupo de empresas en américa latina con capital 100% mexicano, en contar con la certificación de las normas cema emitidas por la conveyor equipment manufacturers association, que regula los estándares para la fabricación de los transportadores de materiales a granel y sus componentes.
business_tags: mining | metals and mining | conveying equipment
generated_description: the company is a market leader in mexico, specializing in the manufacturing of rollers for band conveyor belt conveyors such as rollers, poles, impact beds, and conveyor covers. they are part of a select and small group of companies in latin america with 100% mexican capital. the company is certified by the cema standards issued by the conveyor equipment manufacturers association, which regulates the manufacturing standards for bulk material conveyors and their components.
generated_business_tags: impact beds manufacturer | conveyor covers | conveyor belts manufacturer
